Heal Minor Wounds.name: Heal Minor Wounds
Heal Minor Wounds.description:
Instantly heals a single target in melee range
 Heal : 1-8 x Power
Heal Minor Wounds.Damage_formula:
min = damage[0][0]
			max = damage[0][1]
			real = damage[0][0] + randi() % (damage[0][1] - damage[0][0])
			for i in range(power) :
				min += damage[1][0]
				max += damage[1][1]
				real += damage[1][0] + randi() % (damage[1][1] - damage[1][0])
